responsibilities_pt.item: Liderei iniciativas de transformação cultural Cloud Native, desenvolvi pipelines GitOps/DevSecOps com Bamboo e Shell Script e implementei stacks de monitoramento com Grafana, Prometheus, Loki e Alertmanager.
Gerenciei Redis, RabbitMQ, Helm Charts customizados, Dockerfiles e clusters locais com K3d.
Criei automações com Terraform e reforcei a segurança na AWS aplicando o princípio do menor privilégio.
Também gerenciei Vault e Consul da HashiCorp, garantindo segurança e resiliência na gestão de segredos e rede.

responsibilities_en.item: Led Cloud Native cultural transformation initiatives, developed GitOps/DevSecOps pipelines with Bamboo and Shell Script, and implemented monitoring stacks with Grafana, Prometheus, Loki, and Alertmanager.
Managed Redis, RabbitMQ, custom Helm Charts, Dockerfiles, and local clusters with K3d.
Created Terraform automations and reinforced AWS security by applying the principle of least privilege.
Also managed HashiCorp's Vault and Consul, ensuring security and resilience in secret and network management.
